meta.content: Education; Corrections; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

abstract.p: Because of an editing error, Oct 11 article about campaign by New York parents for a return to traditional neighborhood high schools misstated address of Lab School for Collaborative Studies

block.p: Because of an editing error, a front-page article on Oct. 11 about a campaign by New York parents for a return to traditional neighborhood high schools misstated the address of the Lab School for Collaborative Studies, a magnet school that draws students from all over the city. It is at 333 West 17th Street. Another Lab School, at 1700 Third Avenue, is an elementary school.

Because of an editing error, a front-page article on Oct. 11 about a campaign by New York parents for a return to traditional neighborhood high schools misstated the address of the Lab School for Collaborative Studies, a magnet school that draws students from all over the city. It is at 333 West 17th Street. Another Lab School, at 1700 Third Avenue, is an elementary school.
